name: Crazy Planes Racing Simulator
description:
Go ahead and live out your racing dreams with Crazy Planes Racing!!!

Start your engine and get ready for some fun!

Feel the thrill of racing like never before in this action-packed, heart-thumping Crazy Planes Racing game.

FEATURES  

* Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls And Touch Controls
* Eye popping high definition 3D graphics * Environments that keeps changing  * Life like character animations and physics
* Awesome realistic sound effects recorded from real planes.
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
